sentences.en: For her, he was the kernel of life, and to touch him alone was bliss.
sentences.cn: 他是她生活的核心, 碰他一下就是一种莫大的幸福.

sentences.en: He's in bliss that he's won the Nobel Prize.
sentences.cn: 他非常高兴,因为获得了诺贝尔奖金.

sentences.en: I didn’t have to get up till 11 – it was sheer bliss.
sentences.cn: 我可以睡到11点才起来，真幸福啊。

sentences.en: I thought only of the bliss given me to drink in so abundant a flow.
sentences.cn: 我想到的只是源源而来任我畅饮的幸福.

sentences.en: In the bliss, in the agony her spirit failed and she tottered.
sentences.cn: 在幸福中, 在极度的痛苦中,她的精神衰竭了,她摇摇欲坠.

sentences.en: It was a scene of such domestic bliss.
sentences.cn: 这是一派天伦之乐的场景。

sentences.en: It was bliss, it was eternity.
sentences.cn: 这真是神仙般的生活, 但愿能永生永世地过下去.

sentences.en: It's sheer bliss to be able to spend the day in bed.
sentences.cn: 整天都可以躺在床上真是幸福.

sentences.en: My joy in grief, my second bliss in joy,'came to my side.
sentences.cn: 我的悲伤中的快乐, 我随着欢乐而来的福, ’ 来到我身边.

sentences.en: My point of bliss is not upward, but here.
sentences.cn: 我的福,不在天上, 而在这儿.

sentences.en: She clings to a romantic fantasy of wedded bliss.
sentences.cn: 她沉醉于婚后幸福的浪漫幻想。

sentences.en: They were in a state of bliss during the honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 他们在蜜月期间幸福无比.

sentences.en: What bliss to be going on holiday.
What bliss! I don't have to go to work today.
sentences.cn: 太高兴了! 我今天不用去上班.

sentences.en: Where ignorance is bliss , it is folly to be wise.
sentences.cn: (谚语)难得糊涂(该糊涂就得糊涂).

trans.tran_cn: 极乐，天赐的福，幸福无比，狂喜
trans.tran_en: Bliss is a state of complete happiness
